From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Veratis awoke in a start."Ice, please don't do that to me while I'm
sleeping." He lay back again but couldn't fall back to sleep. "Alright you
win, I'm on my way." His chamber opened up and he stepped out. He wasn't
fully functional yet. he was beginning to wonder if giving her this body was
a mistake. She was the bear but it was him that was fealing grumpy at the
moment. He stepped to the replicator and created a reboost compound (Roboyic
coffee) he sucked it down and proceeded to the lab. He stepped in and saw
the mess that the drones had created. "Should I even bother to ask what went
on in here?" He saw the two drones on the floor. "Never mind, I don't want
to know." He proceeded to the computer to see what the scans for the night
had read. "It seems you had a strong ECG reading for the night." Again the
old science bot checked the mess in the room. "Which would explain this
mess." He checked all the readings multiple times to be sure of the results.
"It seems the virus is out of your system, you're free to go outside
whenever you like. "Preferably ASAP." his thoughts weren't easy to hide as
he started programming the other drones to clean up the mess.

After his job was complete he decided that since he was already awake he'd
check the DNA that foxfingers hsd brought back. he had a grizzly bear, a
wolf, and an extremely powerful raptor. those deffinitely had
possabilities.The Dragon cells were an odd addition and (Whatever Tavatron
turned into) could be set aside for now. He decided to start with the
raptor. he programmed another protoform and began the procedure. He tried to
deprogram the parts of the DNA that were Transmetal2 technology. As an
experiment he injected the virus once again. If Primes prophecy was to
become a reality he'd need to make creatures to fit the description. "All
would become one" and Translife and organics would join.

> Ice::
>
> As she woke up, the drones stopped moving and fell to the floor.  She
> got up and stretched and yawned. She walked over to the drones and
> looked at them. "I wonder how they got over here?"  She send out the
> mental message to Veratis. "OK, I"m rested. What other tests do you
> want to do now?"
